mapper.select: SELECT b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_investment a WHERE a.investment_id = b.`ID` AND a.yn = 1)num, (SELECT MAX(f.yn)s FROM follow_investment f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f.investment_id = b.`ID` GROUP BY f.investment_id )yn FROM investment_institutions b WHERE short_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

SELECT ii.id, ii.short_name, ii.create_time, ii.type, ii.logo, ii.kenel_case, a.cc FROM investment_institutions ii INNER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) cc,ps.investment_institutions_id FROM projects ps LEFT JOIN project_financing_log pfl ON ps.id = pfl.project_id WHERE pfl.financing_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} AND ps.investment_institutions_id IS NOT NULL AND ps.project_type = 0 GROUP BY ps.investment_institutions_id ORDER BY cc DESC )a ON ii.id = a.investment_institutions_id AND ii.logo IS NOT NULL AND ii.logo != '' WHERE ii.type = 1 ORDER BY a.cc,ii.short_name DESC
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}

select ii.id, ii.short_name, ii.create_time, ii.type, ii.logo, ii.kenel_case, a.cc from investment_institutions ii INNER join ( SELECT COUNT(*) cc,ps.investment_institutions_id FROM projects ps LEFT JOIN project_financing_log pfl ON ps.id = pfl.project_id WHERE pfl.financing_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} AND ps.investment_institutions_id IS NOT NULL AND ps.project_type = 0 GROUP BY ps.investment_institutions_id ORDER BY cc DESC )a on ii.id = a.investment_institutions_id and ii.logo is not null and ii.logo != '' order by a.cc,ii.short_name desc
LIMIT #{beginNum},#{pageSize}
